content:
## Weekly Agenda

This week I worked on finishing LPython sync 
and integrating the string/struct refactors to
get integration tests working again.

I also wrapped up the Union refactor PR

## Achievements

- Uncommented Integration tests in LP
- Union refactor

## Pull Requests

- [#7966 Union ASR Refactor](https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/pull/7966)

## Goals for next week

Continue the LPython sync
